help.short: Name of the virtual machine resource.

commands.name: delete

help.short: Name of the virtual machine resource.
Whether force delete was specified.
Whether to just disable the VM from azure and retain the VM in the VMM.

commands.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the virtual machine resource.
Gets or sets the extended location.
The extended location name.
The extended location type.
The identity of the resource.
The type of managed service identity.

Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.
Gets or sets the location.
Gets or sets the Resource tags.
Firmware type
Guest agent status properties.
Gets or sets the Public Key provided by the client for enabling guest management.
Hardware properties.
Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.
Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.
Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the vm. Defaults to 1 if unspecified.
Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine.
Network properties.
Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the device key value.
Gets or sets the ipsettings.
Gets or sets the nic allocation method.
Gets or sets the dns servers.
Gets or sets the gateway.
Gets or sets the ip address for the nic.
Gets or sets the mask.
Gets or sets the name of the network interface.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the network resource to connect the virtual machine.
NIC type
Gets or sets the power on boot.
OS properties.
Gets or sets administrator password.
Gets or sets administrator username.
Gets or sets computer name.
Gets or sets the guestId.
Specifies the linux configuration for update management.
Gets or sets the type of the os.
Specifies the windows configuration for update management.
Specifies the patch settings.
Specifies the assessment mode.
Specifies the patch mode.
Placement properties.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the cluster resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the datastore resource on which the data for the virtual machine will be kept.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the host resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.
Gets the security profile.
Specifies the security settings like secure boot used while creating the virtual machine.
Specifies whether secure boot should be enabled on the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the SMBIOS UUID of the vm.
Storage properties.
Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the controller id.
Gets or sets the device key value.
Gets or sets the device name.
Gets or sets the disk mode.
Gets or sets the disk total size.
Gets or sets the disk backing type.
Gets or sets the name of the virtual disk.
Gets or sets the unit number of the disk on the controller.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the template resource to deploy the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.
